nodes.text: Caldra Tertius, along with Caldra Prime, was a location around which a number of trade worlds were situated. A group of pirates blazed a hyperspace lane from the Vosch Cluster to the trade worlds around the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY. Part of the Rebel Alliance fleet grouped at a rendezvous point in the Mid Rim that laid between the Vosch Cluster and the trade worlds around Caldra Prime and Caldra Tertius was threatened by the presence of the pirates.
Caldra Tertius was mentioned in "Rendezvous Point," a short story written by Jason Fry and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
